Banner.Name: Juan David Contreras
Banner.Subtitle: Software Developer
Banner.Description: I have +2 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, automations, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code with Node.js and .NET tools, applying best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Over +2 years of experience, I have covered roles as: backend developer, frontend developer, and automation analyst. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.

I constantly seek to optimize workflows by integrating AI Agents and MCP Servers to streamline task development. My focus is not only on speed, but on applying AI in a secure, efficient, and scalable way, standardizing patterns that allow the project to progress in an agile, organized manner with a solid foundation.
Some of the technologies I have been trained in and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Digital Identity Manager & Web Development
Description: Comprehensive management and implementation of the digital identity for Multisoluciones S.A.S, defining branding guidelines, online presence, and visual consistency.
Design and development of the corporate website optimized for SEO, with clear information architecture and a responsive UX/UI experience.
Building and deployment of the web platform in a production environment, applying performance, accessibility, and scalability best practices.
Definition of the color palette, logo, and graphic guidelines oriented towards digital positioning and brand strengthening.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Development and maintenance of a platform for managing and issuing electronic documents to the DIAN.
Creation and implementation of modules with complex reactive forms.
Backend API coding using NestJS.
Frontend API request coding using RxJS within Angular.
Automated testing coding, both unit and E2E.
Participation in technical and architectural decision-making for the project.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer & Automation Analyst
Description: Participation in design and architecture meetings for a chatbot management platform powered by LLMs.
Analysis, design, and implementation of automated workflows using N8N and LLMs.
Refactoring legacy code and ensuring dependency compatibility during updates, along with regular Angular version upgrades.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Web Developer
Description: Developing and maintaining an ERP business management platform for accounting, inventory, customers, and suppliers, built with Blazor, .NET, and SQL Server.
Refactoring and optimizing application deployment times.
Coding API requests using .NET libraries and EntityFramework.
Refactoring legacy code and applying LINQ queries to optimize data loading times.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Trainee Fullstack Developer
Description: During more than 2100 hours of intensive in-person training, I immersed myself in web development, English, and soft skills. This process marked my entry into the tech world and provided the foundations for writing professional code, working in teams, and tackling real challenges in development environments.
Applied best practices and design patterns in practical projects, working on the backend with .NET and MySQL, and self-teaching frontend development with Angular.
Participated in requirements analysis, planning, and database design as part of the solution-building process.
Developed APIs with .NET and EntityFramework as part of the project backends.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multisoluciones S.A.S
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I was responsible for the design and development of the corporate web interface, creating a modern, accessible user experience aligned with the company's brand identity. I implemented reusable components, form validation, and a scalable structure focused on performance and maintainability.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lotto
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I participated in the development of a fullstack system for tracking lottery ticket sales. It features a point-of-sale module, real-time notifications, Excel file export, and more. Developed using React and NodeJS.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Latin Lust Studios
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I designed the logo and developed the website for Latin Lust Studios, implementing a responsive interface, consistent visual identity, and an optimized structure for service presentation and client acquisition for an adult production and streaming platform.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I'll be happy to hear from you if you'd like to talk about new opportunities. Message me, and I'll respond as soon as I see it.
